'''''Spinner of Lies''''', also known as '''''Sword of the Gods: Spinner of Lies''''', is a novel by [[Bruce R. Cordell]] in the [[Sword of the Gods series]].

{{quote|''Memories of his past incarnations haunt [[Demascus]], even as he searches for stolen portraits that contain the trapped souls of [[demigod]]s. Meanwhile, [[drow]] creep beneath the city of [[Airspur]], intent on precipitating war between [[Akan√ªl]] and a rival nation. As Demascus attempts to win freedom from the ghost of his murdered lover, he agrees to thwart the drows' secret scheme, sending him on a trail that stretches between the [[Demonweb Pits]], Airspur, and an island that appears on no map.''}}
